email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 85,000 MT of iron ore from Santos to Rotterdam under FOB terms. We understand that your vessel, MV OCEAN STAR, might be available for this route. Could you confirm her current position and availability for a laycan starting around October 10? Additionally, could you provide an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for your inquiry. MV OCEAN STAR is currently in Durban and can be repositioned to Santos for your laycan, ideally starting from October 10. The initial freight quote for this shipment would be USD 18.50 per metric tonne. Please note that this rate includes fuel but excludes any potential demurrage charges.

Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lisa Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Lisa,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review this and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates and the expected loading window in Santos?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 17.75 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, and the loading window in Santos is expected to be 3 days, starting from October 10.

Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Lisa Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Final Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Lisa,

Thank you for the revised offer. The rate of USD 17.75 per metric tonne is acceptable. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements, and let us know once the contract is ready for signing.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Contract Preparation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for confirming the rate. We will proceed with the contract preparation and will send it over for your review and signature within the next 24 hours.

Best regards,
Lisa Smith
